exclusion.criterion: Patients who had undergone medical and surgical treatment for lower urinary tract symptoms
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with neurological diseases (Parkinson's, Multiple Sclerosis etc ...)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with indication for surgical treatment at the time of initial admission
exclusion.label: met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He has a severe 2cm bulbar urethral stricture that requires surgical treatment.
